Unlock: When you reach 6th level overall you may take the ability below.

Whenever an ember created by your @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.58I1UTE8ZV4CJ5W6]{Adherent Ember} cantrip detonates, gain temporary hit points equal to the number rolled on the detonation damage die, not including any modifiers or bonuses.

system.requirements: 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class
